thought: To implement the requested workflow, I need to define the necessary trigger and actions first. The trigger will be the manual trigger, and the actions will include aiCompletion to generate the joke and slack message post to send the joke to the #jokes channel.
plan: Define a trigger function for manualTrigger.default.default to start the workflow.
Define an action function for aiCompletion.default.default to generate a joke with word count between 100 and 200.
Define an action function for slack.message.post to send the generated joke to the #jokes channel.
criticism: Currently, no functions are defined, so the workflow cannot run. Defining these functions is the first step before implementation.

functions.comments: Manual trigger to start the workflow when user clicks the button.
Generate a joke with more than 100 words but less than 200 words using AI completion.
TODO: Test joke generation length and quality.

functions.comments: Send the generated joke to Slack channel #jokes.
